articles.title: 37 Gifts That Don't Cost A Lot But Will Absolutely Become One Of Their Favorites
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro launched Cheirosa 59 Hair & Body Perfume Mist, which is designed to channel the brand's ever-popular Cheirosa 62 but with a more woodsy vibe. It has delectable notes of sandalwood and vanilla orchid.

articles.title: ‘딱딱' 소리 나는 턱, 전문의가 추천하는 턱관절 운동법은?
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: GoSearches is promoting 'New Flooring'. The advertisement encourages users to explore the new product immediately.

articles.title: Google launches AI Mode in the UK amid ‘major shift' in online search
articles.author: Holly Williams
articles.summary: Google is launching AI Mode in Google Search across the UK, an AI-powered tool powered by Gemini 2.5, which allows users to ask lengthy and complicated questions. AI Mode appears as a tab on the Google Search results page and in the Google app for Android and Apple smartphones. It assists in exploratory questions and complicated tasks like comparing products, planning a trip, or understanding complex how-tos.

articles.title: Google launches AI Mode in the UK amid ‘major shift' in online search
articles.author: Holly Williams
articles.summary: Google is launching 'AI Mode' in Google Search across the UK, an AI-powered tool powered by Gemini 2.5 designed to handle complex questions and follow-ups. This new feature, available via a tab in Google Search and the Google app, allows users to ask longer, more nuanced queries, offering a new way to perform online searches with multimodal support through text, voice, or pictures.

articles.title: ARM & HAMMER™ Rolls Up Its Sleeves and Delivers 'The Whole Darn Arm' for Hardworking Consumers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ARM & HAMMER™ launched "The Whole Darn Arm" campaign to support consumers with their everyday needs. The campaign includes national advertising, activations at Major League Baseball® events, influencer partnerships, a Laundry Room Glow-Up Giveaway, and distribution of free ARM & HAMMER™ products.

articles.title: Soapy Toads Debuts New Store in Saint Paul's Historic Pioneer Endicott Building
articles.author: Source
articles.summary: Soapy Toads opened a new store in downtown Saint Paul on July 25th, offering handcrafted soaps and eco-friendly products. The opening of the larger store was supported by the City of Saint Paul and the Saint Paul Downtown Alliance.

articles.title: The ‘Vogue' AI model backlash isn't dying down anytime soon
articles.author: Listen to
articles.summary: Guess is using AI-generated models in their advertisements, as seen in the August print edition of Vogue, featuring the AI model promoting their summer collection. Seraphinne Vallora created the AI model after being approached by Paul Marciano, Guess's co-founder.

articles.title: Baby Dove, Peanut launch free digital hub for new parents
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Baby Dove, in partnership with Peanut, launched Nested, a new digital hub designed to support first-time parents. This platform offers expert content, a doula directory, and peer forums to provide resources and community for modern mothers. Nested also highlights Baby Dove's line of skincare essentials for newborns.

articles.title: Estée Laundry is back—and this time it's got a newsletter
articles.author: Eve Upton-Clark
articles.summary: Estée Laundry launched in 2018 as an online service intended to expose controversies within the beauty industry. The account encouraged followers to participate in discussions about daily beauty news until some members left and the account became inactive.

articles.title: Swig opening day is set. Here's when you can buy dirty sodas in Lafayette.
articles.author: The Advocate
articles.summary: Swig is opening its first store in Louisiana, located in Lafayette. The grand opening is scheduled for 10 a.m. Wednesday, introducing Swig's beverage and service offerings to the Louisiana market.

articles.title: Aldi's Crispy New Find Tastes Just Like It Came from Chick-fil-A, and It's My New Favorite Lunch Item
articles.author: Parade
articles.summary: Aldi's Kirkwood Crispy Chicken Nuggets are being touted as a great alternative to Chick-fil-A nuggets. The product is made with white meat chicken breast and rib meat and come fully cooked, frozen, and breaded. The nuggets have received positive reviews for their crispy texture, juicy tenderness, and flavor, making them a convenient and tasty meal option.

articles.title: Last Chance: Up to 50% Off Womanizer's Bestselling Pleasure Toys
articles.summary: Womanizer is having an end-of-summer sale with up to 50% off on select products, including the Womanizer OG Premium Clitoral Stimulator with Pleasure Air Technology, Enhance 2-in-1 Clitoral Stimulator with Pleasure Air & Vibrations, and Wave. The sale ends tonight, and stock is limited.

articles.title: Just 30 Under-$25 Products From Amazon's "Most Wished For" Section You'll Want To Add To Cart
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Amazon shoppers are adding Crayola retractable markers, OPI RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish, NeeDoh "Dream Pop" fidget toy, and a Dash single-serve ice cream maker to their wishlists. Beauty items like Medicube's collagen jelly, Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, and Bio-Collagen's Real Deep sheet mask are also popular. Additionally, Anua pore-clearing cleansing oil and Eos' Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion are gaining traction.

articles.title: Baidu Aims to Transform Livestreaming with AI
articles.author: Undercovered Deep Insights
articles.summary: Baidu unveiled Nova, a next-generation digital human technology designed for professional-level AI livestreaming, leveraging the Ernie 4.5 Turbo model for real-time facial expression syncing and script generation. Nova also features rapid cloning tech that captures a person's voice, tone, and body language to create emotionally engaging digital replicas, with a planned industry-wide rollout in October after invite-only pilots in education and healthcare.

articles.title: Amazon brings color to Saudi Arabia with new Kindle Colorsoft devices
articles.author: Arab News
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Kindle Colorsoft in Saudi Arabia and the UAE. Kindle Colorsoft features a 7-inch Colorsoft display, adjustable warm light, and weeks of battery life, starting at SR1,069 ($285) for the 16 GB version.

articles.title: Microsoft is testing its own AI browser via Copilot Mode for Edge
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Microsoft is launching Copilot Mode for Edge, an experimental version of its browser that integrates Copilot into new tabs and allows it to access content on all open tabs. This mode, currently free for a limited time with usage limits, replaces the standard "new tab" page with a Copilot interface, offering an AI chatbot for search queries.

articles.title: Amazon's Bestselling AI Translation Earbuds Are 80% Off, and Shoppers Say They're 'Really Quick and Accurate'
articles.author: Michael Charboneau
articles.summary: Tagry AI Translation Earbuds are on sale for $40, offering real-time translation in 164 languages via an accompanying app. These earbuds feature twin 16mm drivers, noise reduction, up to 80 hours of playback with the charging case, and IPX7 water resistance, making them suitable for various activities and travel.

articles.title: Chrome will now display AI reviews of online stores
articles.author: Lawrence Bonk
articles.summary: Google has introduced a new feature for its Chrome web browser that displays AI-generated reviews of online stores. This feature provides information on product quality, pricing, customer service, and return policies by scanning user reviews from partners like Reputation.com and Trustpilot. Currently, this feature is available only for US shoppers using the desktop browser.

articles.title: ‘Like Tinder': Huge problem with Aussie cars
articles.author: James MacSmith
articles.summary: The author test drove the BYD Shark and Tesla Model Y.  The Tesla Model Y impressed the author with its ride, comfort, and technology, leading to a purchase, while also mentioning the Cybertruck. The test drive experiences influenced the author's buying decision.

articles.title: Nothing is as good as the controls on these high-end headphones
articles.author: John Davidson
articles.summary: Nothing's Headphone (1) possesses an impressive detail that distinguishes it from its competitors.

articles.title: NICE to buy Cognigy in $955M AI acquisition
articles.summary: NICE's CEO states that the company's $955 million deal fast-tracks its AI innovation agenda. The deal aims to set a new standard for customer experience in the AI era, indicating a service enhancement.

articles.title: These are the 5 best AI features on the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 I actually use
articles.author: Brady Snyder
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Flip 7, a foldable phone featuring Galaxy AI, which enhances user experience through features like optimized Gemini Live, AI Select, and Object Eraser. The device also offers improved Interpreter and Call Assist functionalities, building on previous models and expanding AI capabilities for users.

articles.title: Quhuo Partners with NIU World to Launch Innovative Fresh Beef Chain Brand Incubation Platform, Accelerating the Transformation of China's Fresh Beef Consumption Market  Jul. 28, 2025 18:00
articles.summary: Quhuo Limited and NIU World have partnered to launch a new chain brand incubation platform focused on fresh beef in China. This platform aims to meet consumer demand for premium fresh beef by creating a vertically integrated supply chain. The platform will provide comprehensive support to high-potential brands, including supply chain management, digital operations, and strategic investment.

articles.title: Amazon Is Selling Shark's $650 AI Robot Vacuum for Just $300, and Shoppers Say It 'Outshines Roomba'
articles.author: Jeff Turbett
articles.summary: The Shark AI Hepa Robot Vacuum Cleaner is on sale for $300 on Amazon, a 54% discount from its original price of $650. This WiFi-enabled robot vacuum features a HEPA filter, a 60-day capacity self-empty base, LiDAR 360-degree vision, and is compatible with Alexa, making it suitable for whole-house cleaning on various surfaces like carpet, hardwood, and tile.

articles.title: Ratan Jha Digital Delivers Real Results for Clients Who Are Tired of the Status Quo
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Ratan Jha Digital introduces a new approach to digital marketing services aimed at rapidly scaling client profitability, thereby changing the financial landscape for its clients with a suite of effective tools.

articles.title: Copilot Mode Turns Microsoft Edge Into An AI Browser - Here's What It Can Do﻿
articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.summary: Microsoft has announced Copilot Mode for Microsoft Edge, which integrates Copilot directly into the browser to assist users in real-time with various tasks. This experimental mode is available for free as an opt-in tool, providing a chatbot-like experience with chat, search, and web navigation capabilities, supporting voice commands and accessing user history. Separately, Perplexity launched an internet browser called Comet that has AI built in and OpenAI is expected to roll out an AI browser built around ChatGPT.

articles.title: The Gamesir G7 Pro Is Almost the Perfect Pro Controller... Almost
articles.author: Jason Cockerham
articles.summary: GameSir has launched the G7 Pro controller, an upgraded version of the original G7, featuring improved ergonomics with dual-material grips and matching accessories like a docking station and USB-C cable. The controller boasts a design similar to the Xbox controller, with enhanced attention to detail.

articles.title: How is Google's Artificial Intelligence Changing Internet Search?
articles.author: News Analyst
articles.summary: Google's Search Generative Experience (SGE) is a new feature using AI to provide comprehensive answers directly in search results, impacting website click-through rates. Websites that adapt by creating in-depth, high-quality content that AI systems prefer will thrive in this new era.

articles.title: 'Perfect' every day t-shirt now comes in 4 different money-saving multipacks
articles.summary: Next introduced value multipacks of their popular Cap Sleeve T-Shirts, offering sets of three to ten shirts in various color combinations. The multipacks are available on Next's website and have received positive customer reviews for their comfort, fit, and value.

articles.title: Google Chrome adds AI-powered store summaries to help US shoppers
articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.summary: Google has introduced an AI-powered update to its Chrome browser, providing AI-generated store reviews for U.S. shoppers to enhance purchase decisions. This feature, accessible via an icon in the browser, summarizes store reputation based on reviews from partners like Bazaarvoice and Trustpilot, with the goal of a safer and more efficient shopping experience.

articles.title: Chrome can now show you reviews of the store you're browsing.
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Google's Chrome now displays store reviews. Users can view a star rating and an AI-generated summary of store details by clicking the icon next to the URL. The AI summary includes customer service, product quality, shipping, pricing, and returns.

articles.title: From Meta To Mezcal, Zacal's Tech Vets Are Betting Big On Agave
articles.author: Lela London
articles.summary: Zacal, a new mezcal brand, has launched with a limited run of 600 bottles, focusing on quality and traditional production methods in Michoacán, Mexico. The initial mezcal releases are Ensamble and Manso Sahuayo. The Zacal Manso Sahuayo is priced at $94, while the Ensamble is priced at $140.

articles.title: New humanoid robot brings human-like touch to hospitality services
articles.author: Kaif Shaikh
articles.summary: KEENON Robotics launched its new bipedal humanoid service robot, XMAN-F1, at WAIC 2025, showcasing its capabilities in various interactive setups like a medical station and lounge bar. The robot autonomously delivered presentations and product demos, highlighting KEENON's move towards interoperable robot fleets in hospitality, delivery, and healthcare solutions.

articles.title: Dyson V8 Absolute cordless vacuum drops to $349 in new online deal
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a limited-time discount on the V8 Absolute cordless vacuum, reducing the price from $519 to $349. The vacuum features up to 40 minutes of runtime, a de-tangling Motorbar cleaner head, and a HEPA filtration system.

articles.title: Lazada launches month-long Mom & Baby Fair
articles.author: Iza Iglesias
articles.summary: Lazada Philippines launched its month-long Mom & Baby Fair on the LazMom channel, offering exclusive deals on childcare needs. Lazada is also strengthening the LazMom Club, providing members with exclusive discounts and access to AI-powered shopping assistance through LazzieChat.

articles.title: Centric Software Launches Breakthrough Mobile PLM to Power Faster, More Agile Product Creation from Anywhere and Anytime
articles.author: Centric Software
articles.summary: Centric Software launched a new native mobile application for iOS and Android on July 28, 2025. The app is designed for hybrid, fast-paced product development teams to redefine how brands and retailers engage with Product Lifecycle Management. It enables teams to work with up-to-date information for maximum speed and agility.

articles.title: Aldi's ‘phenomenal' £5 hair oil dupe is returning – it's £30 less than posh version & leaves locks super soft & shiny
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its popular Lacura Honey Infused Hair Oil, a budget-friendly alternative to a luxury brand, priced at £4.99. Alongside the hair oil, Aldi is also bringing back the sell-out LED Face Mask for £12.99, the LED Mirror with Make-Up Brush Set for £5.99 and the Dual Hair Styler for £16.99.

articles.title: Wayfair has the Ninja Luxe Café espresso machine for under $200; but only through today
articles.author: Rachel Morrison
articles.summary: Ninja is offering the Luxe Café Premier Series 3-in-1 Espresso, Coffee & Cold Brew Machine. The machine provides flexibility in brewing espresso, drip coffee, or cold brew, working with Nespresso-style capsules and ground coffee. It includes a fold-away milk frother and adjustable cup tray.

articles.title: Amazon's New Kindle Colorsoft Has Lower Price To Fix First Model's Problem
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Amazon released a more affordable version of its color-screen ebook reader and a new color Kindle designed for children.

articles.title: Glow, guard and go: Shop IMAGE Skincare's all-in-one SPF solution
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: IMAGE Skincare introduces its DAILY PREVENTION collection, featuring multi-functional moisturizers with built-in broad-spectrum SPF. The collection includes the SPF 30 Nourishing Lip Balm, SPF 30 Clear Solar Gel, SPF 30 Sun Serum Tinted, SPF 75 Advanced SmartBlend Mineral Moisturizer, SPF 50 Ultra Defense Moisturizer, SPF 30 Pure Mineral Tinted Moisturizer, and the Protect + Refresh Mist SPF 40, all designed to simplify skincare routines with sun protection and anti-aging benefits.

articles.title: IDEAL Shower Doors Delivers Frameless Glass Excellence Across Bedford, NH
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: IDEAL Shower Doors in Bedford specializes in frameless glass services. The company provides services focused on modernizing bathrooms.

articles.title: Google Adds AI Summaries of Business Reviews to Chrome URL Displays
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new AI-driven feature in Chrome that provides aggregated summaries of online store reviews. This feature allows shoppers to easily access an overview of a company's reviews while visiting their website by tapping the info icon next to the URL. The summaries are generated from reputable websites and Google reviews, aiming to give consumers more insight into a business's overall post-fulfillment consumer experience.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold7: Powerful versatility in the thinnest, lightest Z Fold yet
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, featuring a thinner design, enhanced camera with a 200MP wide-angle lens, and a foldable-optimised UI. The device introduces One UI 8 on Android 16, offering multimodal AI capabilities such as Gemini Live for real-time assistance and screen sharing.

articles.title: Nintendo Accidentally Leaks New Pokémon Legends Z-A Online Mode
articles.author: Brent Koepp
articles.summary: Nintendo's upcoming Pokémon Legends Z-A game is speculated to include a new online mode called 'Link Play', potentially offering online multiplayer features absent in previous games. This mode, discovered on Nintendo's pre-order page, might allow players to team up for battles, particularly against the new Rogue Mega Pokémon.

articles.title: Accelerating construction of a modern industrial system
articles.summary: Heqi No. 1, China's first nuclear steam supply project, has been launched, transforming nuclear energy from a single-purpose power source into industrial steam supply, delivering over 3.17 million tonnes of clean steam to the Lianyungang petrochemical base. Nanjing Iron & Steel Co., Ltd. adopted "AI chefs" to transform traditional R&D paradigm in steel production.

articles.title: Pizza Hut Israel Teams Up with Pairzon to Deliver Smarter, Faster Marketing Results
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Pizza Hut Israel partnered with Pairzon, an AI marketing platform, to improve marketing performance. Pairzon's AI helped Pizza Hut identify high-value customers and personalize marketing campaigns, resulting in increased customer visits, improved marketing efficiency, and lower cost per purchase.

articles.title: How tough is Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7?
articles.author: Richard Lawler
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 is undergoing durability tests by JerryRigEverything on YouTube. The new hinge design demonstrates surprising resilience despite its slim profile, while the protruding camera lenses introduce a slight wobble.

articles.title: The Curators and Tajín launch chilli & lime pork puffs
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: The Curators and Tajín have collaborated to launch a limited-edition variant of Pork Puffs, flavored with Tajín's Clásico seasoning.  The product launched DTC via The Curators' webstore and will be available in Sainsbury's, Asda and Ocado in September. This launch follows a sampling drive at Taste of London.

articles.title: Conceal Launches the World's First Browser Native Security Service Edge (SSE), Establishing a New Standard for Browser Security
articles.author: Conceal Inc
articles.summary: Conceal launched Browser Native Security Service Edge (SSE), a new solution that replaces VDI, VPN, and legacy SSE by securing the browser. This service delivers secure access to any application from any browser, globally.

articles.title: I finally found a tablet that can easily replace my iPad and Kindle (and is affordably priced)
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: TCL launched the Nxtpaper 11 Plus tablet, which features the ability to switch from full color to an E Ink-like display. This tablet is available at Walmart for $249 and includes 256GB of internal storage and an 11.5-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate.

articles.title: 5 Android phones you should buy instead of the Samsung Z Fold 7 (and why)
articles.author: Jason Howell
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7 featuring a re-engineered hinge, stronger display, and lighter design. While more expensive and lacking S Pen support, it represents an upgrade over the Galaxy Z Fold 6, which remains a viable alternative, particularly for stylus users and those seeking discounts as retailers clear inventory.

articles.title: Amazon's New Kindle Colorsoft Has Lower Price To Fix First Model's Problem
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Amazon has released a new, more affordable version of the Kindle Colorsoft with a seven-inch color screen, the same processor as the older model, and 16GB of storage. Additionally, Amazon is launching the Kindle Colorsoft Kids edition, which includes a year's subscription to Amazon Kids+ and a colorful wraparound cover, priced at $269.99.

articles.title: NGP VAN Launches Major Upgrades to Mobilize: Fully Translated Spanish-Language Event Feeds, QR Code Check-In Enhancements, BlueSky Sharing, and Group Chat
articles.author: NGP VAN
articles.summary: NGP VAN announced product updates to its Mobilize organizing platform to deepen grassroots engagement, streamline event logistics, and expand multilingual access. The updates represent an enhancement to the existing Mobilize platform.

articles.title: First look inside as Macclesfield's 'smallest shop' opens for business
articles.author: Matthew Hancock-Bruce
articles.summary: Silktown Soap Company has opened its first physical store, described as Macclesfield's 'smallest shop,' offering customers a range of handmade vegan soaps, skincare, and haircare products. The opening marks a significant expansion for the company, which started during the lockdown.

articles.title: Laundry will 'smell fresh' and 'feel softer' if you use 1 unusual ingredient
articles.author: Sydney Evans
articles.summary: Julia Hunt suggests using orange peel vinegar as a laundry detergent alternative. To make the solution, orange peels are steeped in white vinegar for two to three weeks, then strained. Half a cup of the solution is added per load to help clothes 'smell fresh, feel softer, and stay free of synthetic fragrances'.

articles.title: I can't believe it took so long to get to a 360-degree drone –but I'm so excited for it!
articles.author: Adam Juniper
articles.summary: Insta360 and partners are launching a new drone brand called Antigravity, which will feature 8K spherical 360° capabilities similar to the Insta360 X5 camera. This new product aims to offer a competitive alternative in the consumer drone market.

articles.title: Amazon launches cheaper kindle colorsoft models including first-ever kids version
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Amazon has launched two new color e-reader models, Kindle Colorsoft and Kindle Colorsoft Kids, at lower prices than the original model. The Kindle Colorsoft is priced at $249.99 and the Kindle Colorsoft Kids debuts at $269.99 with kid-friendly features. These new models cater to budget-conscious readers, comic and manga enthusiasts, and young readers, with the compromise of reduced storage and some premium features compared to the Signature Edition.

articles.title: 30 Top-Rated Products For Your Body That We Refuse To Gatekeep
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro launched a hair and body fragrance mist with notes of caramelized vanilla, tonka bean, and toasted macadamia nut. Medicube introduced "Zero Pore" Pads with lactic and botanical extracts, designed for skin exfoliation and pore minimization. Juno & Co. released Clean 10 Cleansing Balm, a balm-to-oil formula with pearl barley and vitamin E, to remove makeup.

articles.title: What Jennifer Meyer Can't Live Without
articles.author: Jennifer Meyer
articles.summary: Jennifer Meyer is celebrating the 20th anniversary of her namesake brand with the launch of a new perfume that blends strawberries, coconuts, and neroli blossom to evoke a beach-like scent. The article also highlights other products she favors, including U Beauty's moisturizer and Favorite Daughter's jeans.

articles.title: Introducing Antigravity: The Future of Aerial Exploration and Storytelling
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Antigravity, a new drone brand incubated by Insta360, has officially launched. The company is set to unveil its first product, a sub-249g 360 drone with 8K resolution, in August 2025, with a focus on immersive flight and ease of use for both beginners and experts.

articles.title: Amazon's 'absolutely amazing' �50 'stylish' smartwatch is now �25
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Shoppers express satisfaction with a stylish and affordable piece of tech, indicating a positive reception for a new product launch.

articles.title: Lidl is selling a £15 gadget that shaves minutes off your laundry routine – and it's half the price of branded versions
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Silvercrest White Garment Steamer for £14.99, a budget-friendly device designed to quickly remove creases from garments. Featuring a removable water tank, brush attachment, and auto shut-off, this product offers a cost-effective alternative to steamers from brands like Philips, Rolipo, Jack & Rose, and Russell Hobbs.

articles.title: Canoe Daily Deal: Get $150 off the Dyson V7 vacuum
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Dyson V7, a cordless and bagless stick vacuum designed for cleaning carpets and hard floors, is currently on sale at Best Buy Canada for $350, discounted from its normal price of $500. The Dyson V7 can transforms to a handheld unit, and features up to 40 minutes of cleaning power per charge.

articles.title: Don't have Microsoft Word? Here are a ton of free options for all your needs
articles.summary: Microsoft offers Microsoft 365, a cloud-based subscription service with access to desktop apps like Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Google provides Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides, accessible with a Gmail account. LibreOffice offers a free desktop program including a word processor, and Microsoft also offers a free, web-based version of Word. WPS Office provides a free, ad-supported version with a modern design.

articles.title: Similarweb Launches GenAI Intelligence Toolkit, Tracking Visibility and Traffic Across AI Chatbots
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Similarweb has launched its GenAI Intelligence Toolkit, an AI-powered solution that combines AI Brand Visibility and AI Traffic. This new product allows companies to monitor their brand's presence on AI platforms such as ChatGPT and measure the traffic generated by AI referrals, providing a comprehensive view of brand performance in the evolving digital landscape.

articles.title: Become a Tech Product Manager with ISB Online's GenAI-powered 28-week Certification Programme
articles.author: SPOTLIGHT
articles.summary: ISB Online is launching a Professional Certificate in Product Management Programme. This 28-week online program focuses on Tech Product Management, AI, and GenAI. Participants will learn to build, launch, and scale products through live masterclasses, hands-on tools, and real-world projects.

articles.title: Exact date Aldi beauty dupes hit shelves and it's very soon
articles.author: Lynn Kernan
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new beauty products under its Lacura brand, including the Girl Gone Bad Mascara (£5.99), a dupe for Benefit's BADgal Bang mascara, and a range of Lacura Almond bodycare products (£4.99 each) comparable to L'Occitane's offerings. Aldi is also introducing the Lacura Perfect Skin Tint (£3.99), Lacura Luminous Lip Oil (£3.99) and Sculpting Brow Gel and Pencil (£3.40).

articles.title: Driving Angola's digital economy
articles.author: Adeline Chen
articles.summary: Start-ups in Angola are introducing new digital services such as rideshare and digitized food delivery. These services are designed to cater to the needs of the country's growing middle class, driving a digital revolution.

articles.title: OPPO Launches the Night Photo King Reno14 Series in Nigeria with AI Flash Photography and Stunning Design
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: OPPO Nigeria launched the Reno14 Series, including the Reno14 5G and Reno14 F 5G smartphones. The new series features AI Flash Photography and an Iridescent Mermaid Design.

articles.title: Alibaba enters AI smart glasses race with quark launch
articles.author: Maleeha Zahid
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched its first AI-powered smart glasses, Quark AI Glasses, powered by the Qwen large language model and Quark assistant. The glasses will be available in China by the end of 2025 and will offer features like hands-free calling, real-time translation, music playback, meeting transcription, and integration with Alibaba's ecosystem for payments and shopping.

articles.title: Gen Z And AI: How Emerging Technologies Are Shaping Consumer Behavior
articles.author: Ken Braun
articles.summary: Brands can leverage AI tools like Vertex AI to personalize experiences for Gen Z consumers, tailoring search results to give users the sense that the brands understand them. For implementing an effective AI personalization strategy brands can use tools such as Klaviyo for email marketing, Shopify for e-commerce or HubSpot for building chatbots.

articles.title: 7 CEOs—and one chief commercial officer—explain how they actually use AI to do their jobs
articles.author: Hello and
articles.summary: Several CEOs across different industries are integrating AI tools to improve efficiency, decision-making, and strategic planning. Companies like WorkJam are mandating AI adoption and building AI agents to improve production processes, while Abnormal Security is embedding AI into almost every aspect of CEO operation to scale across more conversations and decisions.

articles.title: Samsung may drop S Pen support from future devices: Report
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung introduced new foldable smartphones, Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, and Galaxy Z Flip7 FE. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 notably lacks S Pen support due to a design change focused on a slimmer profile, while the Galaxy S25 Ultra's S Pen no longer supports Bluetooth features, indicating a shift in Samsung's stylus strategy. The upcoming Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra may also see changes to S Pen support.

articles.title: Cycle Brands launch new fragrance and website at ‘Scent & Sparkles 2025'
articles.summary: Cycle Brands launched four new fragrance products: Pushkarini Incense Sticks, Her Majesty Body Mist, Stop O Power Bag, and Stop O Power Brick at 'Scent & Sparkle 2025'. They also launched their official website to facilitate online purchases and provide product information to customers and partners.

articles.title: Aldi is launching a £15 NutriBullet dupe in DAYS… and it's £55 cheaper than branded version
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: ALDI is launching the Ambiano High Speed Blending Set on July 31st for £14.99. This blender is presented as a budget-friendly alternative to the NutriBullet 600 and comes in three colors with different cup sizes and lids.

articles.title: Can I open a Dutch bank account before I move to the Netherlands?
articles.author: Liana Pereira
articles.summary: ING offers international-friendly bank accounts, enabling users to register and start using the account immediately through their banking app. Users have 90 days to submit their BSN information.

articles.title: Fender Acoustasonic Standard Jazzmaster review: 'this is a wonderful all-round gigging machine'
articles.author: Guitar.com
articles.summary: Fender launched the Acoustasonic Standard Series, including the Acoustasonic Standard Telecaster. The price of the guitar is $600. These guitars provide hybrid acoustic-electric sounds.

articles.title: Everyuth & Snapchat launch AR campaign for Golden Glow Sheet Mask
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Zydus Wellness' Everyuth Naturals launched its new Golden Glow Sheet Mask via an Augmented Reality (AR) campaign on Snapchat, featuring an interactive 'Glow Up Lens.' The campaign targets Gen Z consumers by offering a digital product demo and interactive brand experience.

articles.title: Fashion world divided as Vogue debuts AI-generated model
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
articles.summary: Guess utilized an AI-generated model created by Seraphinne Vallora for its summer collection advertisement in Vogue, marking Vogue's first use of a virtual person. The AI model, a flawless blonde woman, showcased a striped maxi dress and a floral playsuit.

articles.title: Virgin Media and O2 customers facing change which could prove helpful boost
articles.author: editorial@examiner.co.uk
articles.summary: Virgin Media O2 has launched Lumi AI, a new AI tool to enhance customer service by providing real-time analysis and suggesting solutions for customer queries. The tool is currently being piloted and aims to improve resolution times and personalize customer interactions by recommending relevant products and services.

articles.title: One of the Best Spin Scrubbers We Tested Is on Sale at Amazon
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: The Rubbermaid Reveal Power Scrubber, a battery-powered cleaning tool with multiple attachments, is available for $25 at Amazon. It is designed for various cleaning tasks, including grout lines and baked-on messes, and has been positively reviewed for its effectiveness and ease of use.

articles.title: Amazon is selling an 'awesome' $1,500 laptop for just $380, and shoppers say it has a 'smooth performance'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Amazon offers the Mallrace 15.6-Inch Windows 11 Laptop. This laptop features capabilities for spreadsheets, streaming, and Zoom calls and is available at a budget-friendly price.

articles.title: We tried China's next-gen AI gadgets
articles.summary: China is introducing next-generation AI gadgets. Testers are trying out these new AI products to assess their capabilities and features.

articles.title: Brands are trying to get to your door in 15 minutes or less
articles.author: Ben Berkowitz
articles.summary: Disney partnered with Gopuff to launch custom mini-stores, accessible via QR codes on screen, allowing viewers to purchase items for delivery in as little as 15 minutes. Starbucks also piloted a program with Gopuff where baristas make drinks inside Gopuff fulfillment centers for rapid delivery.

articles.title: Golden Penny commits to quality nutrition
articles.author: Punch
articles.summary: Golden Penny Foods, a brand of Flour Mills of Nigeria Plc, is committed to nourishing Nigerian families. The company intends to do so by providing quality food products, based on consumer feedback received during its food festival debut.

articles.title: Virgin Media and O2 'pilot' big change with millions of customers set to benefit
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: Virgin Media O2 launched Lumi AI, a new AI tool designed to enhance customer service by providing real-time analysis and helpful prompts to customer service agents. Lumi AI is being piloted to help resolve customer issues faster and more effectively, and suggest relevant products and services.

articles.title: New shop in American Dream turns your iris into art. Check out more new businesses
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Tesla opened a service center at Totowa Commons mall on July 17, offering electric vehicles like Model Y and Cybertruck. Iris Galerie launched a service at American Dream mall on July 16, transforming iris photos into art.

articles.title: The Renault Duster Is Coming Back: What's New This Time?
articles.summary: Renault is preparing to launch the next-generation Duster SUV in India, featuring a redesigned exterior and revamped interior with modern tech like a large touchscreen and digital instrument cluster. Prices are expected to start around Rs 11 lakh (ex-showroom).

articles.title: Guess's AI Model In Vogue Ad Sparks Debate On Beauty Standards
articles.author: Hera Rizwan
articles.summary: Guess featured an AI-generated model in its Vogue ad for the August issue. Seraphinne Vallora, founded by Valentina Gonzalez and Andreea Petrescu, created the AI model after being contacted by Guess co-founder Paul Marciano via Instagram for the summer campaign.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7: Opening Struggles Spark Controversy
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 with advanced camera features and a starting price of $1999. The company is bringing camera technology from the new Galaxy Z Fold 7 to older models. However, users reported difficulties opening the device, which Samsung is currently investigating and addressing through customer support and potential software updates.

articles.title: Skincare under ₹499: Get best deals on face washes, face creams, toners, and more at Amazon
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Amazon is having a Great Freedom Sale starting July 31st. During the sale, several skincare products such as face washes, sunscreens, toners, face scrubs, face creams, hand creams, and body lotions are available for under ₹499. These products aim to provide affordable skincare solutions for various needs, from cleansing and sun protection to hydration and exfoliation.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G With Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 Processor Will Go on Sale on August 1, 2025; Check Price, Specifications and Features Here
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava launched the Blaze Dragon 5G in India on July 25, 2025, featuring a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, a 120Hz display, and a 50MP camera. The sale begins on August 1, 2025, with a special launch price of INR 8,999, including bank offers and exchange discounts, and a contest offering a chance to win the phone.

articles.title: The End of Google Maps and Waze?
articles.author: Marc Menendez-Roche
articles.summary: NDrive, a Portuguese navigation app, offers a simpler, offline alternative to Google Maps and Waze. The app provides basic navigation features and allows users to download maps for free, with optional paid upgrades for live traffic and radar alerts. NDrive is available globally and doesn't require an account, focusing on privacy and ease of use.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 Review: A Massive Leap Forward for Foldables
articles.author: Rob Edwards
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable device featuring a thinner and lighter design with upsized screens (6.5-inch cover, 8.0-inch main). It includes a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, an improved camera system with a 200-megapixel wide-angle lens borrowed from the S25 Ultra, and enhanced AI functionality. The starting price is AUD$2,899.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7 review: The foldable that finally feels like a flagship
articles.author: Itai Smuskowitz
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone with significant improvements over its predecessors. It features a thinner and lighter design, an upgraded camera system including a 200MP main sensor, and is powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite. The price starts at $2,200, and it runs on One UI 8 with Android 16, incorporating Galaxy AI features.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Review: Slimmer, Smarter, and Closer to a Daily Driver Than Ever
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring an ultra-thin design and upgraded features. It includes improvements in the displays, performance with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Elite chip, and enhanced software with One UI 8 and Galaxy AI. The phone also boasts a 200MP camera.

articles.title: I've been testing the 3i G10+, and it's the perfect budget robot vacuum for small homes
articles.author: James Holland
articles.summary: 3i has launched the G10+, a budget-friendly hybrid robot vacuum and mop with a large, compressing dust cup, ideal for small homes. It features an extending side brush and mop pad for thorough edge cleaning and strong vacuuming performance. While docking on carpet may be challenging and mopping capabilities are basic, the G10+ offers a compelling value proposition.

articles.title: Watch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 do something amazing in this brutal bend test
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7, the thinnest Fold yet, was released on Friday and immediately subjected to a durability test. The $2,000 foldable handset's scratch resistance and other damage susceptibilities are being tested.

articles.title: Smooth & Glowing: 4 Luxurious Body Scrubs to Pamper Your Skin
articles.summary: A variety of exfoliating scrubs are introduced, featuring scents and ingredients like coconut, rose, almond, and honey for different skin benefits. These products are available for purchase, and IDPL may earn a small commission from sales made through provided links.

articles.title: ‘Lazy and cheap': Fashion mag Vogue under fire for debuting AI-generated model in print campaign (VIDEO)
articles.summary: Guess is launching their summer collection with an AI-generated model created by Seraphinne Vallora, marking the first instance of such a model appearing in Vogue magazine. Guess co-founder Paul Marciano directly approached Seraphinne Vallora to develop these AI models, selecting blonde and brunette versions after reviewing several drafts.

articles.title: 삼성전자, 올인원 세탁건조기 ‘인피니트 AI 콤보' 출시
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the 'Infinite AI Combo', an all-in-one washer/dryer with a stainless steel design and AI-powered features such as 'AI Custom+' and 'AI Saving Mode'.  It features a 7-inch 'AI Home' touchscreen, 'AI detergent auto-injection', and is priced at 6.99 million won.

articles.title: Weighing the strengths, weaknesses of Customs BOdogwu
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Nigeria Customs Service (NCS) launched BOdogwu, a digital platform. The platform addresses glitches in Customs operations.

articles.title: Nestlé Romania maintained its good growth pace in Q2
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: Nestlé Romania launched a new range of coffee mixes in the Cappuccino segment under the NESCAFÉ brand. The launch includes new recipes, a new packaging design, and a new communication campaign focused on enjoying coffee.

articles.title: Want to know what you (and others) bought this month?
articles.author: Maddy Wilson
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Supersonic Nural™ Intelligent hair dryer with five attachments and intelligent drying features. Frank Green offers customizable ceramic reusable bottles. Heller's Popcorn Maker is available at The Good Guys. Panasonic features Nanoe & Mineral Hairdryer with hydrating mineral ions and Stanley Quencher H2.0 water bottle has double-wall vacuum insulation.

articles.title: Thailand's NIA Launches ‘Impactful Innovation' Movement to Spark National Progress
articles.author: NIA
articles.summary: The National Innovation Agency (NIA) in Thailand is promoting impactful innovation through its '4G Strategy'. Examples of innovations include MuvMi, a Thai electric Tuk-Tuk startup, and 'Pinto Roi Sai', a community-based tourism and culinary experience. These initiatives aim to drive economic growth and societal benefits.

articles.title: Amazon's first colour Kindle arrives in Australia: Colorsoft offers ‘real paper' reading experiences
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: Amazon has launched its first-ever color e-reader, the Kindle Colorsoft, in Australia. Available in 16G ($399) and 32G ($449) sizes at Amazon Australia, the Colorsoft features a color display for images, book covers, and highlighted text, along with waterproof capabilities and auto-adjusting features for enhanced reading.

articles.title: MXZ Offers Gaming PC with RTX 4060 for Only $829
articles.author: Alfred Custodio
articles.summary: MXZ has launched its Gaming Desktop PC, now available for $829 (after a $470 saving) at Newegg. The desktop features an AMD Ryzen 5 5600 processor, GeForce RTX 4060 graphics, 16 GB of DDR4 memory, and a 1 TB SSD on Windows 11 Pro, designed for fast load times and high frame rates during gaming and multitasking.

articles.title: Huawei Shows Off 384-Chip AI Computing System That Rival Nvidia's Top Product
articles.summary: Alibaba released a new flagship open-source reasoning model named Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507. The model has outperformed proprietary benchmarks.

articles.title: Samsung Offers $1,000 Discount on Galaxy Z Fold 7 at Launch
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7 with a $1,000 discount for early adopters starting July 28th, 2025, available through Samsung.com, major carriers like Verizon, AT&T, and T-Mobile, and retailers such as Best Buy. The Z Fold 7 features a 7.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, and an upgraded camera system.

articles.title: 'I tried the viral slushi machine that's all over your feed. Here are my thoughts.'
articles.author: Hannah Kelly
articles.summary: The 'Ninja Slushi Professional Frozen Drink Maker' chills and spins drinks into slushies in 15-60 minutes. It works with various drinks, including sugar-free options with slight modifications, and is easy to use and clean. The Ninja Slushi is available for purchase online.

articles.title: Ansett is back! It's now a travel brand powered by AI
articles.author: Dan Barrett
articles.summary: Ansett has been relaunched as an AI-powered online travel booking service by Constantine Frantzeskos, founder of Saleschef. Using the URL www.ansett.travel, Frantzeskos has delivered an 'AI travel concierge service' based around bookings, utilizing hundreds of generative AI agents to offer personalized services like pricing holidays, customer support, and advertising material creation, aiming to provide every Australian with a full-time AI travel agent.

articles.title: Digital humans show future of livestreaming e-commerce
articles.author: Fan Feifei
articles.summary: Baidu Inc's Ernie foundation model powers dual digital avatars as cohosts to generate over 55 million yuan in gross merchandise value. JD.com introduced a digital human of its founder to promote various products, resulting in 50 million yuan in sales. The rise of digital humans in e-commerce aims to attract consumers, reduce costs, and boost product sales.

articles.title: Bezos backs basic EV pick-up where radio, back seats and power windows will cost you extra
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Slate Auto promotes its no-frill trucks, emphasizing their adaptability to various needs. The trucks are designed to 'change into whatever you need it to be'.

articles.title: York entrepreneur launches AI tool to give competitor insights
articles.author: York Press
articles.summary: A York-based entrepreneur launched a new AI platform. The platform aims to empower businesses by providing detailed competitor insights and actionable digital growth plans.

articles.title: Boots shoppers 'always get compliments' on �20 designer perfume
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: A perfume is available at half of its regular price, presenting a promotional offer for consumers.

articles.title: MADMIA Celebrates Superman Movie with Fan Favourite Socks
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: MADMIA launched Superman Socks, designed to embody fun, self-expression, and confidence for fans. The socks feature details like a plush arm and velvet cape, crafted with excitement and imagination.

articles.title: ClassNK grants Innovation Endorsement for Products & Solutions to ‘CYTUR-MCTI' (component of Rakuten Maritime) developed ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: ClassNK granted its Innovation Endorsement to the maritime cybersecurity support solution 'CYTUR-MCTI'. This endorsement signifies the introduction of a new or updated maritime cybersecurity product or service.

articles.title: How Agentic AI is changing the game in CX and beyond
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Agentic AI transforms customer experience by enabling autonomous, hyper-personalized, and proactive engagement. This new technology impacts customer interactions across various industries.
